import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Segment , Card} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" export default function TenderLogs(props) { const [pdfUrl ,setPdfUrl] = useState('') const [target ,setTarget] = useState('') const [min ,setMin] = useState('') const [donors ,setDonors] = useState('') const [beneficiary ,setBeneficiary] = useState('') const [raisedAmount ,setRaisedamount] = useState('') const [request ,setRequest] = useState('') const [balance, setBalance] = useState('') const weiTOeth=(amount)=>{ const ConvertedAmount=props.web3.utils.fromWei(amount); return ConvertedAmount; } useEffect(async()=>{ const info = await props.contract.methods.getTenderinfo().call(); setMin(weiTOeth(info[0])) setTarget(weiTOeth(info[1])) setPdfUrl(info[2]) setBalance(weiTOeth(info[3])) setBeneficiary(info[4]) setDonors(info[5]) setRequest(info[6]) setRaisedamount(weiTOeth(info[7])) } ); return (
{console.log(props.web3)}

Tender Status:

{beneficiary} Address of the creator This address can create request for collected amount {target} ETH {min} ETH {raisedAmount} ETH Tender Current Balance: {balance} ETH Number of Requests: View Requests
) }
